Sure, this game is fun and all with your friends or when your bored but DO NOT BUY ANYTHING! Do not waste money on this game. There is no point. The logic on this game is non-realistic, being said, the shotguns and other guns AT CLOSE RANGE (I mean seriously, if i'm at his damn chest he should be shattered not half health) are nerfed, the game was made free and hackers took advantage making the gun unfun to play for players. Also, THOSE DAMN HE GRENADES. "Highly explosive". Smurfs also took advantage, making accounts to make the game unfun for players who are a lower level. If you buy product, you wont get your money back after you just realized this game isn't that fun as it used to be. I would try out games where they are supposed to be unrealistic, unlike this game.
